properties.title: Hippo CMS Extra Folder Context Menus

section.name: Hippo CMS Extra Folder Context Menus
section.p: This project provides extra Folder Context Menu items such as 'Copy folder...' and 'Move folder...' for Hippo CMS 7 with extendable base implementations for developers.
The best way to explain this feature is probably to show screenshots.

img.alt: Folder copy and move context menu

section.p: After installing this plugin, you will be able to see 'Copy folder...' and 'Move folder...' context menus.
In the Folder Copy dialog, you can select the destination folder, folder name and folder URL name.

Please try to click on the "See Also" links field to open the linked documents. The document links are automatically reset to the corresponding copied documents under the same copied root folder if the linked document was under the same root folder.
In the Folder Move dialog, you can select the destination folder, folder name and folder URL name.

Please try to click on the "See Also" links field to open the linked documents. In this case, the document links are not affected by moving the folder because all the internal document lnks are based on node identifiers (UUIDs).

subsection.name: Demo Application with Hippo CMS 10
subsection.p: You can check out, build and run demo application, which contains all the examples explained in this site documentation.
Here are example commands to check out, build and run demo application:

div.source: $ svn checkout https://forge.onehippo.org/svn/folderctxmenus/folderctxmenus-demo/trunk folderctxmenus-demo-TRUNK $ cd folderctxmenus-demo-TRUNK $ mvn clean verify $ mvn -P cargo.run

subsection.p: You can check out, build and run demo application, which contains all the examples explained in this site documentation.

div.source: $ svn checkout https://forge.onehippo.org/svn/folderctxmenus/folderctxmenus-demo/branches/folderctxmenus-demo-0.2.x $ cd folderctxmenus-demo-0.2.x $ mvn clean verify $ mvn -P cargo.run
